arguments.arg: The record type. Can be one of the following: `A`, `AAAA`, `ALIAS`, `CAA`, `CNAME`, `MX`, `MXE`, `NS`, `TXT`, `URL`, `URL301`, `FRAME`.
Add a TXT record with this address to the domain. Alias for `--type TXT --address `.
Add a CNAME record with this address to the domain. `--type CNAME --address `.
When adding host records, sets the _TTL_. By default, namecheap sets 1800.
The host name for adding dns records.
The address of the new host record.
MX preference for hosts. Applicable to MX records only.
